mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ct_user_info WHERE ct_user_info.card_no = #{card_no} AND ct_user_info.deleted = 1

SELECT id, ctuserinfo.real_name, mobile_phone, card_no, born_day, sex, id_card_number, email, address, ctuserinfo.user_id, sysuser.user_name OperatorName, referee_card_no, ( SELECT real_name FROM ct_user_info ctuserinfotmp WHERE ctuserinfotmp.card_no = ctuserinfo.referee_card_no ) referee, accumulate_integral, ctuserinfo.store_id,
head_url, remark, create_time, ctuserinfo.deleted FROM ct_user_info ctuserinfo LEFT JOIN sys_user sysuser ON ctuserinfo.user_id = sysuser.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_store sysstore ON sysstore.store_id = ctuserinfo.store_id WHERE ctuserinfo.deleted = 1 AND ctuserinfo.store_id = #{store_id}
AND ctuserinfo.card_no like CONCAT('%',#{card_no},'%')
AND ctuserinfo.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{real_name},'%')
AND ctuserinfo.mobile_phone like CONCAT('%', #{mobile_phone},'%')
AND ctuserinfo.sex = #{sex}
AND unix_timestamp( create_time ) > unix_timestamp(#{start_time})
AND unix_timestamp( create_time ) < unix_timestamp(#{end_time})
mapper.update: UPDATE ct_user_info SET born_day = #{born_day}, sex = #{sex}, mobile_phone = #{mobile_phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, id_card_number = #{id_card_number}, referee_card_no = #{referee_card_no}, remark =#{remark}, real_name=#{real_name}, update_time = SYSDATE() WHERE card_no = #{card_no}
